message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13500.
I'm glad we're working towards a fair price, Alice. Considering my budget, I'd like to suggest a price of $12500 for the product.

I'm glad we're making progress, Bob. However, I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal too. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $13200.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to propose a price of $12800 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13000, which is my absolute minimum. This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $12700 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $13000, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to meet you at $12900, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $12850 for the product.
